General.Name: Cassiar Gold Corp
General.Description: Cassiar Gold Corp. engages in the exploration of gold. The company's flagship property is the Cassiar gold project located in northern British Columbia. It also holds interest in the Sheep Creek Camp project comprising Bayonne and Sheep Creek properties located in Salmo, British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Margaux Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Cassiar Gold Corp. in September 2020. Cassiar Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: Bankers Court, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0R8
